name: Dragovanje
overview: Dragovanje.com is a photo sharing bookmarking community, visually based on a new way of using space on the Internet. Content is a small post with photo and has its headline and short description. Photos can be added directly from any location on the Internet and will have a path to its original source permanently. Dragovanje.com is region oriented network, with focus at woman aged 25-45, offering products, services and inspirations from the region, in local language, but it is not a niche network. It is planning to become the hub for its target group. Technologies used • Web server Nginx + PHP FPM • PHP 5.4.x, JQuery, Twitter Bootstrap • MySQL 5.5.x • Sphinx • Facebook and Twitter API
